frontmatter.title: HTML Canvas Project
frontmatter.description: When you click and drag the canvas, you can draw a line. The line color will change automatically depends where you are on the canvas.

frontmatter.title: Brown and Cony
frontmatter.description: Pure CSS animation project written in HTML and pure CSS. When you hover over Brown, the brown bear, and Cony, the cute rabbit, some animation will start.

frontmatter.title: Project Miguel
frontmatter.description: Miguel, the hedgehog, project is written by HTML and pure CSS. Those little feet move once you open the page.
